DOC.brief_summary: This study examine well dry powder inhaler ( DPI ) albuterol medication work help adult adolescent subject 12 year age old persistent asthma improve lung function .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-ranging Study Evaluate Albuterol Hydrofluoroalkane Subjects Ages 12 Older With Persistent Asthma
DOC.criteria: Must provide write informed consent , Be 12 year age old , Male Female , females nonchild bear potential use reliable contraception Asthma least 6 month , FEV1 ( forced expiratory volume 1 second ) 5080 % predict value , reversibility great equal 15 % follow 180 mcg albuterol Stable low dose Inhaled Corticosteroids Nonsmoker , 12 month smokingfree < =10pack year history Otherwise healthy Other criterion apply Pregnant Allergic albuterol severe milk protein allergy Must another trial 30days . Other criterion apply
